findings.name: non-payable-constructor
findings.message: Consider making costructor payable to save gas. Details: https://sg.run/wRBd

findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
findings.message: quire Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec. Details: https://sg.run/ej3L

findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
findings.message: quire Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec. Details: https://sg.run/ej3L

findings.name: arbitrary-send-erc20
findings.message: msg.sender is not being used when calling erc20.transferFrom. Example - Alice approves this contract to spend her ERC20 tokens. Bob can call function 'a' and specify Alice's address as the from parameter in transferFrom, allowing him to transfer Alice's tokens to himself. Details: https://sg.run/B72A
